descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Anfernee Simons beats three defenders and finishes at the rim.
videos.headline: Simons weaves through traffic and scores acrobatic layup

videos.description: CJ McCollum goes into his bag of tricks to fool Brandon Clarke, draining the jumper before the shot clock expires.
videos.headline: McCollum crosses up Clarke and finishes fadeaway jumper

videos.description: Damian Lillard finds his range from deep to extend the Blazers' lead.
videos.headline: Dame makes crossover to step-back 3 look easy

videos.description: Damian Lillard threads the needle to Larry Nance Jr. who slams it home just before the third quarter buzzer sounds.
videos.headline: Lillard feeds Nance Jr. for buzzer-beating reverse jam

videos.description: CJ McCollum comes up with the steal then converts the corner 3-pointer.
videos.headline: CJ McCollum steals and drills 3-pointer to put Blazers up big

videos.description: Nassir Little and Greg Brown put on a show as the Blazers seal their win over the Grizzlies.
videos.headline: Blazers close out Grizzlies with back-to-back showtime slams
